text: Kazhutʹ, "BOH yavlyaye soboyu krashchyy knower yak dovhi vony zalyshylysya tam." Vin znaye vsi tayemnytsi u nebi ta zemli. Yoho charivnistyu vy mozhete pobachyty; Yoho charivnistyu vy mozhete pochuty. YE nikhto bilya Yoho tomu shcho Lord ta Mayster, ta Vin nikoly ne ne dozvolyaye budʹ-yakym partneram podilyty u Yoho tsaryuvanni
